description:
Move through mountainous terrain with confidence. The versatile Rapid shoe sits somewhere between a trail running shoe and an approach shoe, at home on single track or slabby scrambles. The forefoot insert acts as a rock plate and adds stability when edging on steep approaches. The hybrid lugged outsole provides reliable traction wherever your adventure takes you.

  • Breathable mesh upper with TPU overlays in high-wear areas
  • Sock-Fit LW provides a snug midfoot wrap
  • Ortholite insole cushions underfoot
  • Dual-density EVA midsole with TPU arch for torsional stability
  • Forefoot Dynamic Protection Insert adds rigidity
  • Vibram Megagrip rubber outsole with climbing zone at toe for better edging
name: Scarpa Rapid Approach Shoes - Men's
